content: I made the PR #5647, which relates cocones over a sieve S with families of objects for yoneda preshaves, and shows that a sieve over X realizes X as a colimit if and only if all yoneda presheaves are sheaves. This is needed for the results of the Copenhagen Masterclass.
I've left a couple of cosmetic comments, but LGTM, thanks!
Thanks for the review! I implemented the suggestions.
Ready to be merged if I get the go-ahead...
